sentences: Seda põrandapuhastust vaja ei ole, see juba haisub.
Küünal põles ja tekitas kibedad suitsu haisu.
context: The word 'sita' appears to be the genitive singular form of the Estonian noun 'sitt', which means smell, odor, or scent. It's used to describe various types of smells in different contexts - both pleasant and unpleasant ones.
